author: axic3354
content: Based on the recent discussions implemented the new calls in evmone: https://github.com/ethereum/evmone/pull/630

author: axic3354
content: I did chose different opcode numbers (f8, f9, fb) compared to what was discussed on the call (f6, f7, f8). The main reason being: create3/create4 fits f6/f7 and would be grouped with create2.
